answers.answer: I'm almost 34 weeks and my doctor told me if that happens to come to the office!
Contact your doctor.... That happened to me and I had preeclampsia. My pressure was very high! & they induced me at 30wks 5days!!! My baby is in the nicu and doing great!!!!
Not upper body but my feet and legs are and look like they may have doubled in size.
Go in and get checked good luck
Do you have a home BP meter? If so, check your BP at home, then give your OB a call.

question: Omg I woke up yesterday with a puffy face and it hurt so bad and my hands were the same way I'm 32 wks and was wondering if anyone had this happen to them
title: Have anyone face and hands been swelling
